alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 6:00PM EDT until May 19 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Knox County in southwestern Indiana... West central Daviess County in southwestern Indiana... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 600 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vincennes, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wheatland around 610 PM EDT. Bicknell around 615 PM EDT. Washington around 620 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Edwardsport. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
